extendedInfo.description: Advanced SNES emulator based on Snes9x 1.53 with near complete game compatibility. A 1GHz+ device is recommended for best results. For older devices, a faster version based on 1.43 is available for download on my site. This app is 100% free with no ads.No ROMs are included with this app and must be supplied by the user. A number of public domain games/demos are available at www.pdroms.de. Transfer games anywhere to your internal storage/SD card and browse to them from within the app (default SD card directory on most devices is /mnt/sdcard). ROMs may be in .smc and .sfc formats, optionally in .zip files.Follow me on Twitter for updates about my apps:https://twitter.com/rakashaziVisit the homepage at explusalpha.com for more info, ports for other platforms, and my other apps.

reviews.title: Excellent.
reviews.comment: I have used this emulator for  years, and I was thrilled to find this available for the Android Market when I switched the other day.   This emulator requires no setup upon opening unless of course you wish to use cheat codes (fully supported)    Zero graphical or audio bugs upon testing!
reviews.author: Nathan Whitlow

reviews.title: Best app ever!
reviews.comment: This emulator is great!! It\'s Just perfect, so far no issues and the gameplay is really easy. I would love another console emulator by the creators of this one. Thanks!
reviews.author: Daniel Dobles

reviews.title: Better than the paid ones
reviews.comment: Much better than the (paid)superGNES. Mouse emulation is better, controls are better, and this is free. Thank you for making a free emulator that is better than the aforementioned paid ripoff.
reviews.author: Hitokage Blaze

reviews.title: Perfect and free with NO ADS
Best emulator on the play market
reviews.comment: No ads. Pretty fast. No problems. This by far is the best emulator available. Don\'t waste your time with the others and download this one NOW! :)
reviews.author: Cory Patterson

reviews.title: Hey you
reviews.comment: Hey you. Yeah, I\'m talking to you. Remember your childhood. Back when everything was so much simpler and... HEY! I\'m trying to help you! I\'ll cut to the chase. You spent hours of your life playing chrono trigger and FFVI.  Well this guy is letting you do that all again. So go ahead. You know you want to download it. Really? You need more inventive than that? Alright,  how about no ads. You heard me. None. 0. So go ahead. Download it. Click that little button and enjoy those times when life was simple.
reviews.author: Ian Power

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: Well it works great except now some of the roma I\'ve downloaded are not showing up. Would love go play ff5 and secret of mana buuut not showing up on the list where they should be
reviews.author: Brandon Ghastin

reviews.title: Perfect emulator
reviews.comment: Emulates flawlessly, no ads, it\'s free and it actually SAVES THE GAME! Both in-game save AND save-states. Can you believe that?
reviews.author: Nikoleta Nitu

reviews.title: Perfect SNES player
reviews.comment: very fit to 80s guys like me. It brings me back to my school time playing the SNES with neighour and schoolmates, amazying,    Support
reviews.author: Wilson Leung

reviews.title: Best and Free
reviews.comment: This emulator is flawless. I\'ve almost beaten FF III on it. Never had any issues except some lag. But im using a slow Samsung Galaxy S1. Ill upgrade soon and will have no problems. Get this app!
reviews.author: Josh M

reviews.title: Great app. I just have one question though....
reviews.comment: Love this devs work on all emulators for Android. My only question. Is there a way to get .zst save states to load? I haven\'t been able to do so successfully yet. Other than that, works great!
reviews.author: Chris Ainsworth

reviews.title: Best on the market.
reviews.comment: I have tried the other emu\'s on the market, and some that are not. This is by far the best. From the easy joystick set up, to the great FPS. Love it.
reviews.author: Stephen Bell

reviews.title: Amazing. Love it.
reviews.comment: Pretty handy to play classic SNES titles The touch screen buttons are small but I was saved with the feature to connect a wiimote.  It\'s more comfortable to use for wii owners
reviews.author: Abrahim Chaabo

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Everything works flawlessly but the sound is choppy, could be my phone though. Thanks so much for this,forget the other versions wont let you save state unless you purchase!
reviews.author: Dan A

reviews.title: Its awesome but...
reviews.comment: It should have an option to make the buttons a little bigger. Then it would be perfect.
reviews.author: Jacob Barker

reviews.title: Da bes.
reviews.comment: This is the best Super Nintendo emulator on the market. It\'s free fully supported has no ads and uh it\'s just good. I like it. I\'m going to go play some super mario brothers now.

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Snes roms works perfectly on my Oppo find 5. The app has all the features you could expect from a traditional PC running emulator.

reviews.comment: It keeps deleting my progress from the updates quit updating it because I have to start all over but its a good emulator

reviews.title: One word...brilliant!!
reviews.comment: By far the best emu I have found so far, has run every game i\'ve thrown at it, flawless wiimote connection, bit of lag but my fone is 3 years old now so its to be expected...
